      获取符合过滤条件记录的聚合结果Map
      等价SQL: SELECT FUNC1{column1}, FUNC2{column2}, ··· FROM {table} WHERE {filter bean}
      如 getNumberMapAsync(User.class, (FilterBean)null, new FilterFuncColumn(FilterFunc.MAX, "createtime")) 等价于: SELECT MAX(createtime) FROM {table}
